title: Sofia Vergara ditches her diet to dig into a slice of cake while in a pretty butterfly print dress
text:
Sofia Vergara was seen enjoying a sweet treat while on the set of Modern Family on Tuesday.

The 47-year-old Colombian actress seemed to be eating a vanilla birthday cake as she sat outside while showing off a curve-hugging dress with a butterfly print.

Modern Family is shooting its 11th and final season in Los Angeles.

Yummy: Sofia Vergara was seen enjoying a sweet treat while on the set of Modern Family on Tuesday. The 47-year-old Colombian actress seemed to be eating a vanilla birthday cake

It's not her birthday as she just had one in July.

Vergara was wearing a mid-sleeve black dress with red, yellow, green and white butterflies everywhere.

The former model's hair was down in soft curls as she added light pink makeup and had on large gold hoop earrings.

The wife of Joe Manganiello also wore six inch open-toe black heels in patent leather.

She was seen walking on set as well with a script in her hand and her cat-eye reading glasses.

Working hard: The siren was in a curve-hugging dress with a butterfly print. Modern Family is shooting its 11th and final season in Los Angeles

She made it too: Her co-star Julie Bowen was also seen on set; she had on a sweater and tight jeans with platform sneakers

The ABC comedy is officially ending its 10-year run after season 11.

Modern Family came back in late September with all the main stars: Ed O’Neill, Julie Bowen, Ty Burrell, Jesse Tyler Ferguson and Eric Stonestreet.

Sarah Hyland, Ariel Winter, Nolan Gould, and Rico Rodriguez are also onboard.

She sure loves her sweets: The siren put these goodies on display at her mansion last week

Times flies: The cast from 2009: Ed O'Neill, Eric Stonestreet, Jesse Tyler Ferguson, Julie Bowen, Sofia, Ty Burrell, Nolan Gould, Lindsay Stoddart, Sarah Hyland

The show's co-creator, Steve Levitan, shared a photo of the cast on the first day of filming—and it included all of the original stars (plus newer addition Aubrey-Anderson Emmons).

'Ten years ago we took the first cast photo outside our first #modernfamily table read,' he captioned the before-and-after shot. 'Today, the ending begins.'

Earlier this week the television star took to her Instagram to post three photos of herself and niece Claudia Vergara walking her son Manolo's pet chihuahua Baquette.

Both are dressed in ensembles from her clothing line.

'Home and the ☀️ [sun] is out just in time to wear my #sofiajeans denim corset top on my walk with @cdvergara and @baquettegonzalez,' she wrote in the caption.

Girl time: Later on Tuesday, the television star took to her Instagram to post three photos of herself and niece Claudia Vergara walking her son Manolo's pet chihuahua Baquette

Family matters: Both ladies wore ensembles from Vergara's clothing line

Playing the role of Gloria on Modern Family has made her the highest-paid actress on television for the past seven years.

She banked $42.5 million between June 2017 and June 2018, which is 73% more than second-ranked Kaley Cuoco's $24.5 million.

The final season of Modern Family runs through summer 2020.
